text: pc sales are way down all but one kind
or just silvery all-in-ones it all
started with the imac in its cordless
keyboard and trackpad then came the
clones like the vizio all-in-one touch
pc available in 24 and 27 inches and now
there is the HP spectre 120 4 inches no
touch screen the new imac looks razor
thin doesn't it it's a trick the guts
are behind the screen but it's super
fast and the super sharp screen is not
as glary as regular glossy screens on
the vizio they hit the guts in the base
but it does have a touchscreen which
makes windows 8 a lot less annoying and
finally brand new from HP the spectre
one this time the guts are in the neck
comes with the trackpad and mouse and it
has NFC you can log in by touching one
of these tags to the pc now none of
these come with DVD drives sure you can
buy an external USB Drive but aren't
they supposed to be all in ones still
you can get cheaper computers but come
on couldn't you use a little more beauty
in your life
